metadata.name: Shadow Self
metadata.description:
In this ongoing series Minimal Ways, I give my attention, admiration and companionship to lone and plain subjects that are out in the open and seldom noticed.

These seemingly simple and mundane images remind me of times when I was younger and wanted to be seen and heard by peers and others. The times I had felt passed by, or dismissed as part of the background.

Images captured 2021 - present.
